text: {"insights":["Revenue grew 18% YoY driven by enterprise account expansion and improved enterprise ARPA through bundled contracts","Churn increased from 3.1% to 4.0% following pricing changes, with mid-market and smaller customers showing higher downgrade and cancellation rates","Support tickets rose 25%, primarily due to billing confusion and feature access restrictions, correlating with negative sentiment shift in mid-tier accounts"],"risk":"Mid-market customer segment erosion due to pricing changes may offset enterprise gains if churn continues to accelerate and support burden increases operational costs","next_action":"Conduct pricing sensitivity analysis for mid-market segment and develop targeted retention offers or tier adjustments to reduce churn while maintaining revenue growth"}
